# Land Texture Exclusion List - SAMPLE
#
# This is a sample file showing the format for land texture exclusion lists.
# Generate your own list by running:
#
#   python land_texture_scanner.py --mods "D:/MO2/mods" --output land_textures.txt
#
# Then pass the generated file to the texture optimizers as indicated by the GUI.
#
#   
#
# Format: One texture stem per line (filename without extension)
# Lines starting with # are comments and ignored
# Matching is case-insensitive
#
# Example entries:

tx_ac_dirt_01
tx_ac_dirt_grass_01
tx_ac_dirt_grass_02
tx_ac_dirtroad_01
tx_ac_rock_01
tx_ac_scrubplain_01
tx_ac_scrubplain_02
tx_ai_clover_02
tx_ai_dirt_01
tx_ai_dirtroad_01
tx_ai_grass_01
tx_ai_grass_dirt_01
tx_ai_mainroad_01
tx_ai_mudflats_01
tx_ai_tilled_dirt_01
tx_ashlands_04
tx_ashlands_06
tx_ashlands_07
tx_ashlands_08
tx_ashlands_road_01
